person.persName: Washington Carlton (Hancock County tailor and hotel keeper)

body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky, tailor and hotel keeper. Virginia native. Married to Eliza Carlton. Father of Ann Elizabeth Carlton Vickers, Oletha Carlton, Virginia Carlton, Edmonia Carlton, Thomas D. Carlton, Mary F. Carlton, Joseph W. Carlton, and William S. Carlton. Appointed postmaster of Hawesville, Kentucky, on December 20, 1844. Tailor in Hancock County in 1850. Hotel keeper in Hancock County in 1860.
